issue.title: [Python] Prepare for pandas release without SparseDataFrame
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6556](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6556). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We still have a few places where we use SparseDataFrame. An upcoming release of pandas will remove this class, so we should already make sure it works for that.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6556?focusedCommentId=16929637) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5377
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5377>
